keyMappings:
map d removeTab
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map <c-k> previousTab
map <c-j> nextTab
map <c-1> firstTab
map <c-2> firstTab count=2
map <c-3> firstTab count=3
map <c-4> firstTab count=4
map <c-5> firstTab count=5
map <c-6> firstTab count=6
map <c-7> firstTab count=7
map <c-8> firstTab count=8
map <c-9> firstTab count=9
map - visitPreviousTab
